column4: windows 7 is releasing tomorrow, ubuntu 9.10  in next 8 days & i'm in a dual state of mind :)
i need to buy a new computer, and i will assemble it myself, so how do i ensure to get compatible hardware
i just set up a new comp with ubuntu actually!
oh nice! share the specs please :)
im using core i5 on asus p7p55d pro
and significantly better [faster in layman's words] then a core 2 duo?
i5 cpu and 1156 board is the 'mainstream' 4 core system
fiding the right motherboard might be a problem in my city though :)
oh no no i am not from the US
hey remember yesterday u mentioned core i5, spent quite few hours checking prices, they are still quite costly here in india man
thinking to settle with a core2duo
for a bit more $ you can get a lot more value with i5
actually as they are pretty new around here, prices differ a lot [in india] & shipping from US is not practical :(
